channel.title: My Music on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in My Music on Guy James

item.title: Rebel Leader – No Wars
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: A tune from back in the day by my electronica offshoot, Rebel Leader.

item.title: Why Do Santa’s Reindeer Fly? A Video by Guy James
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: The psychedelic and shamanic origins of Christmas.

item.title: You Are The Seer of Everything
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: New spacey track by me featuring the voice of the spiritual teacher, Mooji. This is the first time I’ve used the ‘glissando guitar’ technique as pioneered by Syd Barrett and perfected by Daevid Allen and Steve Hillage in Gong.

item.title: Guy James Album Available
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: My self-titled album has now been re-released. It was available for a short time at amiestreet.com but that was bought by Amazon and everything on that site was never seen again. So you can listen to it and if you like, buy it (please do!) at music.guyjames.com. It was a real labour of love and I have to say I am very pleased with it. Big thanks to Scutty Lefunk who helped out with large parts of it and contributed two of the greatest guitar solos you will hear, on ‘Crashing on the rocks in your head’ and ‘Residue’.

item.title: William Blake: ‘Proverbs of Hell’ Read by Guy James (amb traduccions en Catala)
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: William Blake: ‘Proverbs of Hell’ Read by Guy James (amb traduccions en Català)

item.title: Guy James – White Horses of the Wind
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Instruments, production and vocals by Guy James. Vocals by Jenny and Natalie. On SoundCloud

item.title: Guy James & Sarah Sansom – The Brunettes
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: On SoundCloud Thanks to Sarah for playing piano and cello on this one.

item.title: Multiplex: Unknown Control (Guy James Remix)
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: A remix I did of a track by the band Multiplex. It was released in Canada only by Piehead records. On SoundCloud
